operations.content:
api_version: '2.0'
route_name: 'release'
endpoint: '/api/release.php'
methods:
  - GET
  - POST
tests:
  - name: 'Test release endpoint with valid data'
    request:
      method: POST
      url: '/api/release.php'
      body: '{"data": "valid_data"}'
    expected_status_code: 200
    expected_response_body: '{"status": "success"}'
  - name: 'Test release endpoint with invalid data'
    request:
      method: POST
      url: '/api/release.php'
      body: '{"data": "invalid_data"}'
    expected_status_code: 400
    expected_response_body: '{"status": "error", "message": "Invalid data"}'
